q1.title: What is Tuberculosis (TB)?
q1.content: Tuberculosis (TB) is an infectious disease that most often affects the lungs. TB is caused by a type of bacteria. It spreads through the air when infected people cough, sneeze or spit.

q2.title: What are the common signs and symptoms of TB?
q2.content: The most common symptoms of TB include:
symptoms: A cough that lasts for more than two (2) weeks
Cough with sputum which is occasionally bloodstained
Dyspnea, night sweats, chest pain, and hoarseness of voice

q3.title: How does TB spread?
q3.content: Infection is usually by direct airborne transmission from person to person.

q4.title: Can TB be cured?
q4.content: The vast majority of TB cases can be cured when medicines are provided and taken properly.

q5.title: What is the treatment and management of TB?
q5.content: TB disease is treated with a multiple drug regimen for 6-8 months (usually isoniazid, rifampin, ethambutol, and pyrazinamide for 2 months, followed by isoniazid and rifampin for 4 to 6 months) if the TB is not drug resistant.

q6.title: What is Direct Observed Therapy (DOT)?
q6.content: DOT is a strategy used to ensure TB patient adherence to and tolerability of the prescribed treatment regimen; a health care worker or another designated person watches the TB patient swallow each dose of the prescribed drugs.

q7.title: What is Video Observed Therapy (VOT)?
q7.content: VOT is the use of a videophone or other video/computer equipment to observe tuberculosis (TB) patients taking their medications remotely.

q1.title: What is MyTBCompanion?
q1.content: MyTBCompanion is a mobile health application to improve the Tuberculosis management among the patients and healthcare. Its main feature is the Video Observed Therapy.

q3.title: How should I register?
q3.content: Enter email, password, personal information and treatment information.

q4.title: How do I record and upload the video?
q4.content: Click the ‘Upload Video’ button in the homepage. Record the video then press 'Upload' button.

q5.title: Is there any specification and requirement of the video?

q6.title: How should I report the side effects of the medication?
q6.content: Click the ‘Report Side Effects’ button in the homepage. Select the date and time, then tick the checkbox on the symptoms that you are experiencing. Then press ‘Submit’ button.

q7.title: How should I track the progress of my medication?
q7.content: Go to Profile page and click the progress tracker.

q8.title: How should I make an appointment for online consultations?
q8.content: Click the ‘Make Appointment’ button in the homepage. Then select the date and time. Finally click the ‘Book’ button.

q9.title: How should I set the reminder to remind me to take medications on time?
q9.content: Go to Profile page and click ‘Settings’. Then click ‘Reminder’. Toggle the ‘Medication Reminder’ then set the time for the reminder.

q10.title: Where can I find information related to TB or the app?
q10.content: You may use Umi (chatbot) or explore the Materials section.

q12.title: How do I edit my profile?
q12.content: Go to Profile page and click the ‘Pen’ icon on the top right corner to edit your profile information.

q13.title: How do I view the history of my appointment and side effects?
q13.content: Go to Profile page and click ‘History’.

fill_in_the_blanks.title: Fill in the blanks!
fill_in_the_blanks.gameInstructionsTitle: Fill in the Blanks Game: How To Play?
fill_in_the_blanks.objectiveText: Fill in the blanks with the correct words to complete the sentences about tuberculosis. Each blank represents a missing word that you need to find and select.
fill_in_the_blanks.selectingWordsText: Choose a word from the list provided by clicking on it. Once selected, it will be placed in the highlighted blank. You cannot reuse a word once it has been used.
fill_in_the_blanks.removingWordsText: If you want to change a word, click on the blank where the word is placed. This will remove the word and allow you to select a different one.
fill_in_the_blanks.timeLimitText: You have {{gameTime}} seconds to fill in all the blanks. Keep an eye on the timer at the top of the screen.
fill_in_the_blanks.submitYourAnswersText: Once you have filled in all the blanks, or when time runs out, submit your answers to see your score and review the correct answers.
fill_in_the_blanks.scoringText: You will earn points for each correct word you place. The final score will be shown after you submit your answers or when time runs out.
fill_in_the_blanks.resettingTheGameText: You can reset the game at any time to try again with a fresh start.
